dao

Class FileSystemDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.FileSystemDAO

  • public class FileSystemDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Access Object class for accessing and deleting files and data stored on the filesystem.
    Author:
    Aran

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileSystemDAO() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean delete(int id)
      deletes an expense image and description file corresponding to the passed unique identifier.
      boolean deleteExpenseDescription(int id)
      deletes description text file on the filesystem under /descriptions/
      boolean deleteExpenseImageData(int id)
      deletes an image on the filesystem under /images/
      java.lang.String readExpenseDescription(int id)
      reads a text file containing an expense description identified by the passed unique identifier
      byte[] readExpenseImageData(int id) 
      boolean writeExpenseDescription(java.lang.String description, int id)
      takes a String and uses it to write a txt file to the filesystem under /descriptions/
      boolean writeExpenseImageData(byte[] expenseImageData, int id)
      takes a byte array and uses it to write a PNG image to the filesystem under /images/
